Name: Ruins Seeker
About the game: Quem, an adventurer, is the first person to step foot in the dungeon, 'Heaven's Ladder', in over 500 years. But not long after she does so, a strange shadowy monster casts some sort of curse on her. 'Come deep――into――this place――I shall await you at――the highest spot――', the apparition says before vanishing. In order to break the curse, Quem teams up with the adventurer Vise to explore the dungeon and to uncover the meaning behind those mysterious words. Features: A Classic Style Action RPG Explore an Ancient Dungeon Switch Between Melee and Ranged Weapons Subquest System Weapon Enhancing System Replay Cleared Dungeons
